main_question: What part of the Constitution legally protects basic rights and freedom of Canadians?
possible_answers: A. The Canada Charter of Responsibilities
B. The Charter of Rights and Freedoms
C. The Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
D. The Canadian Charter of Rights and Free Will
answer: C. The Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
explanatory_sentence: The Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms is the section of the Constitution that legally protects the basic rights and freedoms of Canadians.
